title: Coast.to.Coast.AM.July.11.2009-komie
description:
Manson Conspiracies



Date:
07-11-09

Host:
Ian Punnett

Guests:
Adam Gorightly, James 'Tappy' Wright


Investigative journalist and author Adam Gorightly discussed his astonishing research into several conspiracy theories surrounding mass murderer Charles Manson's "Love and Terror" cult.

In the first hour, Ian spoke with James 'Tappy' Wright, who shared stories from his days as a rock roadie. Author Linda Godfrey appeared briefly at the start of the program to talk about the Beast of Bray Road.
Website(s):
# adamgorightly.com
# rockroadie.net
Book(s):
# The Beast of Adam Gorightly: Collected Rantings, 1992-2004
# The Shadow over Santa Susana: Black Magic, Mind Control & the Manson Family Mythos
# Rock Roadie: Backstage and Confidential with Hendrix, Elvis, The Animals, Tina Turner, and an All-Star Cast
